title: Update Home “Explore by Category” icons to solid minimal black-and-white style

requirements.text: Update the icon style used in the Home page “Explore by Category” section (rendered by `frontend/src/components/home/HomeCategoriesGrid.tsx`) so all category sub-icons look professional, solid/filled, clean, and minimal in an elegant black-and-white luxury theme, without changing the existing layout, spacing, category count/order, or text content.

quotes:
Please update the “Explore by Category” section.
I would like all the category icons (the sub-icons under Explore by Category) to have a professional look 
Make them solid clean, and minimal. Keep the design elegant and consistent with the black-and-white luxury theme. Do not change the layout — only update the icon style.

acceptanceCriteria: On the Home page, the “Explore by Category” section renders the same grid layout as before (same column behavior, card structure, spacing, and typography).
All category icons appear as solid/filled, minimal, and consistent in style (no mixed outline vs solid styles).
Icons use a black-and-white presentation consistent with the luxury theme (no colored accents for the icon glyphs).
No other Home page sections (Hero, Featured Stories, About, Newsletter) or other routes/pages are visually or functionally changed.

constraints: Do not change the Home page “Explore by Category” grid/card layout; only change icon style/appearance.
Keep category names and descriptions in English and unchanged.
Limit changes to the Home page categories icons (component: `frontend/src/components/home/HomeCategoriesGrid.tsx`) and any necessary supporting styles; do not modify immutable frontend paths.
nonGoals: Adding/removing categories or changing their order.
Changing the “Explore by Category” heading/subheading text, card copy, or any non-icon styling beyond what is strictly necessary to support the new icon style.
